Interface IConfigurableMessageConstraintBase

All Superinterfaces:
IConstraintBase
All Known Implementing Classes:
FlagExpect, FlagIndexHasKey, FlagMatches, TargetedExpectConstraint, TargetedHasCardinalityConstraint, TargetedIndexConstraint, TargetedIndexHasKeyConstraint, TargetedIsUniqueConstraint, TargetedMatchesConstraint
public interface IConfigurableMessageConstraintBase extends IConstraintBase
Represents constraint metadata that is common to all constraints.

    getMessage()
    Get a custom message to use when the constraint is not satisfied.

  • Method Details

    • getMessage

      @Nullable String getMessage()
      Get a custom message to use when the constraint is not satisfied.

      A custom message allow for more meaningful information, tailored to the test case, to be provided in the case a constraint is not satisfied.

      Returns:
      the message or null if a default message is to be used
